narrative.narrative: Enerjet is a charter airline based at Calgary,Alberta. It started operations in 2009 and currently acts mainly as a transport for Alberta oil sand workers. It did for a time fly to holiday spots in the Caribbean and Mexico from Calgary,Edmonton,Toronto,Winnipeg and Vancouver. One of the nine founders,Tim Morgan,was a former WestJet Senior Vice-President. As of May 2014 it has three 737-700's.
